name: WKHapticType
desc: Constant indicating the style of feedback to deliver using haptics.

items.name: case notification
items.desc: Alerts the user to an arrived notification when the Watch app is not running in the foreground.

items.name: case directionUp
items.desc: Indicates an increase in a specific value or when a value has gone above a certain threshold.

items.name: case directionDown
items.desc: Indicates a decrease in a specific value or when a value has gone below a certain threshold.

items.name: case success
items.desc: Indicates the successful completion of a task or the answering of a question.

items.name: case failure
items.desc: Indicates the failed completion of a task or answering of a question.

items.name: case retry
items.desc: Indicates that the user should retry a task that temporarily failed.

items.name: case start
items.desc: Indicates the beginning of an action.

items.name: case stop
items.desc: Indicates the end of an action.

items.name: case click
items.desc: Indicates a simple click type of feedback.

items.name: case navigationLeftTurn
items.desc: Indicates that the user should turn left.

items.name: case navigationRightTurn
items.desc: Indicates that the user should turn right.
